svg.font-family: Red Hat Display, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Arial, sans-serif
svg.text: vLLM on AWS Inferentia2 — Deployment Architecture
e.g. inf2.xlarge · 1 chip · 2 NeuronCores · 32 GB HBM
Continuous batching · BF16/FP16 · Tensor parallelism across cores
Model weights bucket · IRSA or Secret-based access · KServe storageUri: s3://bucket/models/
Best for KServe + production: versioned, scalable, supports pre-compiled NEFF cache alongside weights
PersistentVolumeClaim · ReadWriteOnce · gp3 · 30 Gi+ · Mounted at /mnt/models/
Best for direct Deployment: writable volume allows Neuron to cache compiled artifacts in-place
AWS Storage (S3/EBS) provides model storage consumed by the AI Application Layer (see right edge path)
